sense.def: Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of head and eyes being dizzy. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 34: 治傷暑， 胸膈躁悶，昏運倒仆欲死，解毒散方 , “To cure harm caused by summerheat, agitation and pressure in the region of the chest and diaphragm, clouding with dizziness and falling as if one were to die: [apply] the recipe for the ‘powder to dissolve poison’”. Huo 蜮 , huo -bug [9]

Etiological Agent. identical with she gong 射工① , archer. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 7: 江南有射工毒蟲，一名 短狐，一名蜮 , “In the region south of the Yangzi there is a poisonous bug, the archer. Other names are ‘short fox’ and huo -bug ”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xi gui chong 溪鬼 蟲：蜮，音或，蜮 is read huo ”. According to ancient sources, this is a turtle-shaped being with three legs, living on the bottom of streams. It is said to hold sand in its mouth and spout it at humans who fall ill as a result.
